DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine nifedipine treatment woman preterm labor receive corticosteroid result postponement delivery compare placebo .
DOC.criteria: Between 16 44 year age inclusive Singleton pregnancy Intact membrane Between 280/7 week 336/7 week ' gestation inclusive Reported document uterine activity Cervical dilation 2 cm 4 cm inclusive Multifetal gestation Less 28 week ' gestation 34 week ' gestation Ruptured membrane More 4 cm dilate Previously receive course corticosteroid fetal lung maturation Oligohydramnios Fetal growth restriction Chorioamnionitis temperature least 38.0 degree Celsius Fetal death Preeclampsia Suspected placental abruption placenta previa Lethal fetal malformation amniotic fluid index least 35 Systolic BP < 90 mmHg diastolic BP < 50 mmHg Baseline tachycardia ( pulse > 120 2 consecutive measurement 30 minute apart ) Chronic hypertension treat antihypertensive pregnancy Seizure disorder HIV Maternal allergy nifedipine Known maternal cardiac disease Women receive progesterone therapy second third trimester prevention preterm birth
